price: 25. Dan Allah menyeru (manusia) ke Dārussalām (surga), dan memberikan petunjuk kepada orang yang Dia kehendaki ke jalan yang lurus (Islam).
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yadʿū ilā dāri al-salāmi wayahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
